meta.article_title: What Comes First, Speed or Consistency?

developing_consistency.probleme: Should I focus on speed or consistency?
causes_communes: Trying to play at a pace you can't do consistently

debutant: Play each shot at the pace you can do consistently

exercices_complementaires.description: Play each shot at a consistent pace, gradually increasing speed as you improve.

metriques_progression: Gradually increase speed as you get better
erreurs_a_eviter: Trying to play at a pace you can't do consistently
